sentences.en: A girl may fill out before she reaches her full height.
sentences.cn: 女孩子在长足个头之前可能会发胖。

sentences.en: At the height of his fame, his every word was valued.
sentences.cn: 在他声名鼎盛之时，他的每句话都受到重视。

sentences.en: He was only five feet nine, the minimum height for a policeman.
sentences.cn: 他只有5英尺9英寸高，刚刚达到当警察的最低身高要求。

sentences.en: He was struck down at the height of his career.
sentences.cn: 他在事业达到巅峰时病逝了。

sentences.en: I have to give my height in feet and inches.
sentences.cn: 我得报出自己的身高是几英尺几英寸。

sentences.en: Keep the head of the club the same height throughout the swing.
sentences.cn: 整个挥杆过程中要使杆头始终保持在同一高度。

sentences.en: Mitchell is well built, of medium height, with a dark complexion.
sentences.cn: 米切尔体格健壮，中等个头，肤色黝黑。

sentences.en: My sister is the same height but only a size 12.
sentences.cn: 我姐姐是一样的身高，不过只穿12号的。

sentences.en: Our pilot reduced height until we hugged the ground.
sentences.cn: 飞行员降低了高度，最后我们紧贴着地面飞行。

sentences.en: Rachel had always been scared of heights.
Sam’s about the same height as his sister now.
sentences.cn: 萨姆现在身高和他姐姐差不多了。

sentences.en: State your age, height, and weight.
sentences.cn: 说出你的年龄、身高和体重。

sentences.en: The chair has a ratchet below it to adjust the height.
sentences.cn: 这把椅子下面有棘轮调整高度。

sentences.en: The corridors there were painted chocolate-brown to shoulder height.
sentences.cn: 那里的走廊从地面到齐肩高的部分都漆成棕褐色。

sentences.en: The hip-hugging black and white polka-dot dress was the height of fashion.
sentences.cn: 黑白圆点花纹的紧身连衣裙当时是最时尚的。

sentences.en: The needles that indicate your height are at the top right-hand corner.
sentences.cn: 显示你身高的指针在右上角。

sentences.en: The sudden height dizzied her and she clung tightly.
sentences.cn: 突然上升的高度让她晕头转向，她抓得紧紧的。

sentences.en: They were almost the same height and they moved perfectly in step.
sentences.cn: 他们几乎一样高，而且走路时步调完全一致。

words.tran_cn: 高的；高级的；崇高的；高音调的
高度地；非常；非常赞许地
高水平；天空；由麻醉品引起的快感；高压地带
提高；增高；加强；使更显著

phrases.tran_cn: 在…顶点；在…的顶峰或鼎盛时期
室内净高；楼底高度；上升限度
全高度；由楼面至天花板
高度控制；图像高度调整；高度蝶
水柱高度；水位；水位落差
中等身高；不胖不瘦；中等高度

trans.tran_cn: 高度，高，高处，处于顶峰，…的极致，极点
trans.tran_en: how tall someone or something is
